name: Lazaroff Sales
tag_list: sales, salesacceleration, salesoutsourcing, marketing, telemarketing, telemeeting, salesdevelopment
overview:
Lazaroff Sales is a sales outsoursing/ sales acceleration company focused on helping companies, mostly startups, get more sales traction.

We help companies develop their sales process by taking into account any existing sales process, building up what is needed based on the company’s goals and working together with the clients to achieve those goals.
